attributes.action: stop the idea of digital television switchover
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the serving Government stating that Brits are "becoming more obese and more couch-potatoes", it is simply a bad idea of more TV channels, which will encourage a more unhealthy lifestyle. The digital switchover should be scrapped, and replaced with no more than 50 channels on digital - that will be more than enough.
